original_title: Heart of Fartness: Troma's First VR Experience Starring the Toxic Avenger
overview: The Toxic Avenger has a major midlife crisis and must travel to a mythical land called the "Heart of Fartness," deep in the Panamanian jungle, in order to regain his place as the first Super-Human-Hero from New Jersey.
title: Heart of Fartness: Troma's First VR Experience Starring the Toxic Avenger
